question:
Trace the following algorithmic fragment for N = 6.  Show all working in a trace table.
  SUM = 0
  loop COUNT from 1 to (N div 2)
       if N mod COUNT = 0 then 
            SUM = SUM + COUNT
       end if
  end loop
  if SUM = N then 
       output "perfect" 
  else  
       output "not perfect"
  end if         
                                                                                                           [4]
